alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued February 21 at 3:07PM CST until February 21 at 7:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso/Western Hudspeth Counties and Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County
